[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1698762223060{margin-top: -55px !important;}” el_class=”home_banner”][vc_column]
[slide2_element image=”1363″ title=”THIS IS IT!” description=”What Nigerians have been waiting for.
Experience the unforgettable with family and friends” url=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2FiCU2lwB6VfE|title:Watch%20the%20Video” classes=”first”]
[slide2_element image=”1536″ title=”Hawaii 5.0 Water Park Party” description=”Every Friday & saturday from 6pm ⁃ Adults only” url=”url:%2Fgiwa-gardens-water-park-tickets%2F|title:Get%20tickets”]
[slide2_element image=”1537″ title=”Kids Splash & Dash Party” description=”Every Saturday & sunday from 11am” url=”url:%2Fgiwa-gardens-water-park-tickets%2F|title:Get%20tickets”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1681772336204{margin-top: -55px !important;}” el_class=”home_banner”][vc_column]
[slide2_element image=”22300″]
[slide2_element image=”19813″ classes=”first”]
[slide2_element image=”19815″]
[slide2_element image=”19818″]
[slide2_element image=”19821″]
[slide2_element image=”19822″]
[slide2_element image=”19823″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][quickbook_element][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Experience West Africa’s Largest Water Park” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Create moments your children will be singing your praises about for years to come. Welcome to Giwa Gardens, the largest water park in West Africa, providing the perfect family-friendly destination for endless aquatic adventures. As the most technologically advanced water park in West Africa, we offer a thrilling array of rides and attractions that will delight visitors of all ages. Dive into the excitement with our water houses, pirate ships, wave pool, and extreme river, or relax and unwind at our jacuzzi bar. Explore our adventure caves, indulge in delicious dining options at our restaurants and bars, and satisfy your sweet tooth at our ice cream and candy factories. With a spacious car park accommodating up to 800 cars, we ensure convenience for all. Discover a world of fun and entertainment at Giwa Gardens, the ultimate water park experience in West Africa.
Think Giwa Gardens, think…. water park, West Africa, family-friendly, technologically advanced, rides, attractions, water houses, pirate ships, wave pool, extreme river, jacuzzi bar, adventure caves, restaurants, bars, ice cream factory, candy factory, car park.

[/vc_column_text]
[slide_element image=”1354″ title=”The Rainbow” description=”This slide will have you going bananas with its a steep slope down and bumpy slide. Don’t let the colours fool you.” url=”url:%2Fthe-experience|title:Explore”]
[slide_element image=”1187″ title=”The Waterhouse” description=”The Kids water house is perfect for parents & kids as they enjoy a perpetual state of non stop bucket pouring of water as kids take on the huge pirate ship and become captains of the sea.” url=”url:%2Fthe-experience|title:Explore” color=”#022f66″]
[slide_element image=”1481″ title=”River Congo” description=”A high thrill river that feature waves of up to 1m in height, propelling guests forward in addition to giving them an exciting “bump” every 15-20 seconds.” url=”url:%2Fthe-experience|title:Explore” color=”#38873a”]
[slide_element image=”1484″ title=”The Tornado” description=”This huge space bowl is guaranteed to thrill and scare the baby Jeez out of anyone but worry not, all will survive.” url=”url:%2Fthe-experience|title:Explore” color=”#de0f22″]
[slide_element image=”1482″ title=”Jack Sparrow’s Ship” description=”This is a roof-top lounge sits right on top of the extreme river engine room and tank. Imagine standing on the off loading of 15 cubit metres of water every 30 seconds.” url=”url:%2Fthe-experience|title:Explore” color=”#a75a13″]
[slide_element image=”1483″ title=”Victoria Waves” description=”A unique wave pool that artificially generates large waves, similar to those of the ocean and creates thrills that will get families dashing and splashing all day long” url=”url:%2Fthe-experience|title:Explore” color=”#81d2f7″]
[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_btn title=”See it all” style=”flat” shape=”round” color=”primary” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”far fa-heart” add_icon=”true” link=”url:%2Fthe-experience”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1681495587114{background-color: #fcfcfc !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1681496010592{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;background-image: url(https://dev.giwagardens.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/home_legacy.png?id=1344) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text]

The Giwa Legacy

What is the story behind our history and how did we come to be? Find out how the vision for Giwa Gardens Water Park became a reality.

Read all about it >[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Choose Your Giwa Gardens Ticket” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1336″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1681495330883{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Standard Tickets” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]7+ memorable attractions and experiences, use the standard entry lane, (expect long queues), and free parking.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1334″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1681495324947{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Fast-track Tickets” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]7+ memorable attractions and experiences, use the fast-track entry lane, (20 fast track tickets enter before 1 standard ticket enters), free parking.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1335″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1681495306160{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Premium Tickets” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]10+ memorable attractions and experiences, first class experience with rights to skip all queues or use the fast lane. Free Big Daddy Meal, and free parking.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_btn title=”Find your tickets” style=”flat” shape=”round” color=”primary” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-ticket-alt” add_icon=”true” link=”url:%2Fgiwa-gardens-water-park-tickets%2F|title:Giwa%20Gardens%20Water%20Park%20Tickets”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Planning Your Visit” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Visit days are subject to availability, always check and book ahead

We care about meeting and exceeding the highest global standards

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Our organisation practices are independently accredited, reviewed, audited, and certified by premier international organisations. This ensures that we not only meet, but exceed, the highest standards of care, anywhere. We are proud members of the World Waterpark Association based in the USA and have met their standards.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”home__certificate” width=”1/2″]
